custom_field_values_exactly_one_typed_co.name: custom_field_values_exactly_one_typed_col
custom_field_values_exactly_one_typed_co.value:
(
        (value_text    IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_int     IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_numeric IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_bool    IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_date    IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_ts      IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_json    IS NOT NULL)::int +
        (value_uuid    IS NOT NULL)::int
        = 1
      )

custom_fields_required_needs_default.name: custom_fields_required_needs_default
custom_fields_required_needs_default.value: is_required = false OR default_value IS NOT NULL

fi_valid_ecl_stage.name: fi_valid_ecl_stage
fi_valid_ecl_stage.value: ecl_stage IS NULL OR ecl_stage IN ('stage-1', 'stage-2', 'stage-3')

fi_valid_fv_level.name: fi_valid_fv_level
fi_valid_fv_level.value: fair_value_level IS NULL OR fair_value_level IN ('level-1', 'level-2', 'level-3')

match_results_valid_score.name: match_results_valid_score
match_results_valid_score.value: score IS NULL OR (score >= 0 AND score <= 100)

migration_lineage_dedupe_key_idx.name: migration_lineage_dedupe_key_idx
migration_lineage_dedupe_key_idx.where: state = 'committed' AND dedupe_key IS NOT NULL

migration_lineage_reserved_requires_rese.name: migration_lineage_reserved_requires_reserved_at
migration_lineage_reserved_requires_rese.value: state <> 'reserved' OR reserved_at IS NOT NULL

migration_lineage_committed_requires_afe.name: migration_lineage_committed_requires_afenda_id
migration_lineage_committed_requires_afe.value: state <> 'committed' OR afenda_id IS NOT NULL

crud-authenticated-policy-select.name: crud-authenticated-policy-select
crud-authenticated-policy-select.using: (select EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM migration_jobs WHERE migration_jobs.id = "migration_reports"."job_id" AND migration_jobs.org_id = auth.org_id()::uuid))

crud-authenticated-policy-insert.name: crud-authenticated-policy-insert
crud-authenticated-policy-insert.withCheck: (select EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM migration_jobs WHERE migration_jobs.id = "migration_reports"."job_id" AND migration_jobs.org_id = auth.org_id()::uuid))

crud-authenticated-policy-update.name: crud-authenticated-policy-update
crud-authenticated-policy-update.using: (select EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM migration_jobs WHERE migration_jobs.id = "migration_reports"."job_id" AND migration_jobs.org_id = auth.org_id()::uuid))
crud-authenticated-policy-update.withCheck: (select EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM migration_jobs WHERE migration_jobs.id = "migration_reports"."job_id" AND migration_jobs.org_id = auth.org_id()::uuid))

crud-authenticated-policy-delete.name: crud-authenticated-policy-delete
crud-authenticated-policy-delete.using: (select EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM migration_jobs WHERE migration_jobs.id = "migration_reports"."job_id" AND migration_jobs.org_id = auth.org_id()::uuid))
